title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
er with the lowest health. In addition to this, the environment will become more lethal. Puzzles and traps become more complex, additional environmental hazards such as explosive barrels will be scattered across enemy encounters, more enemies may appear in hard-to-reach areas of arena etc. In Tactician Mode, players will need to approach encounters with a well-thought-out-plan, utilizing the strengths and abilities of every one of their party members.
